data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Haute-Vienne. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Haute-Vienne, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Haute-Vienne, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 4,711 believers in Haute-Vienne, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 4,711 believers in Haute-Vienne, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Iu Mien people might believe through him.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Haute-Vienne, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the county of Haute-Vienne to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.section_summary:
the county of Haute-Vienne, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France has a population of 383,400.

We estimate Haute-Vienne has 4,711 people who might know Jesus, 234,457 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 144,232 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, move the 4,711 believers in the county of Haute-Vienne to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."
